title: Tues Post Show (03-22-22)
itunes:title: Tues Post Show (03-22-22)
description:
Bobby starts talking by a man who has spent over $40,000 trying to cover his body in tattoos. Eddie brings a way for Lunchbox to be on the Price Is Right. There was a guy who helped his Tinder date deliver her baby. A listener needs advice on getting into radio. Another voicemail is left asking Bobby to make a challenge for the Arkansas vs. Gonzga game. A listener shared a hot take that Amy is the new biggest sore loser on the show. We also hear some behind the scenes of Eddie trying to get a Tell Me Something good correct.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
